string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "I'm God, I look like Jesus."
"Give it up one times for the playa hatas, yall motivate me so I gotta thank you."
"Oh my God I got b*tches."
"Old friends you grew up with really can't trust em' and the cops is watching you so you really can't bust em'"
"A lot of people said I would never do it, that's what scares me."
"Hoes suck my dick cuz' I sing like Ke$ha."
"Keep ya family close and your based family closer."
"Hoes on my dick cuz I look like Jesus."
"I'm a f-ckin livin legend."
"Get off the stages, this is my show, my performance, for the ages."
"I'm that pretty b*tch."
"25 b*tches on my dick and it's nothin."

"Swag to the maximum."
"Different color diamonds all the women love me she asked about my job and I told her it was lovely."
"Every time the earth shake is when you feeling me speak, I dont try to talk to much but the feeling is deep."
"I look at myself like that goon. The first goon ever to have a baby pink shirt and that respectability."
"You can have the tiniest pants ever. You can do it in the most square way. You can do it like a nerd or whatever. None of that matters because you can remain you and remain real regardless."
"You can be thuggin' at heart, but you don't gotta be literally thuggin' in the streets and hurtin' people and doin' shit. But you could be real at the heart."
"I feel like I'm that new age. Real futuristic grimy shit. But it's like, now niggas will step up to where you're respectably dressed, you're well-mannered, but you're still thuggin'."
"Do whatever makes you feel comfortable."
"You can fuck my bitch, it's happy hour."
"Niggas see me with a SIX FOOT BITCH!"
"I swear to god, I hit 40 licks. My name LIL B, And I'm not no bitch! When I'm off that dope, I'll rob my bitch!"
"First I Park My Car....Then I Fuckk Yo Bitch.."

"Bitch I think I'm basedgod with a arc like noah."
"Knock a bitch head offï»¿ my dick like the ocean."

"Bet I'll bubble up like the dopeman rock, bet I make crack like the dopeman pot."
"I been crossed over, I'm the Answer, YOU DIG ME?!"

"Bet I'm the only goon nigga in these tiny pants."
"Then I realize the power...of jacking off every hour."

"Bulletproof vest purple jeans lookin fru-tay."
"These tiny pants are amazing to me."

"Young Based God and my nuts look like raisins."

"Hoes suck my dick, and my dick touch her brain."
"Dirty everythang. You can't be half ass dirty you gotta be all the way, ya feel me?"
